name: Break your Fall
description:
Made from scratch in 48 hours for Ludum Dare #48

Theme: Deeper and deeper

Oh no, your rope snapped when you were climbing, and now you are falling faster and faster to your death!

No need to panic though, if you collect the right items on your way down, you might get strong enough to survive the landing..

                     

                   

Weights make you heavier, and speed you up even more!

Feathers make you lighter, so if you have any weight on you, they help you slow down!

Clouds temporarily slow you down a lot. 

Calcium makes you stronger. You need to collect enough of this before you hit the ground to survive! The faster you are falling, the stronger you need to be. Keep an eye on the color of your speed. If its red, you need to slow down or get stronger. 

Good luck!
